channel.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
channel.description: Its by far one of the best Minecraft add ons. http://wiki.sk89q.com/wiki/CraftBook etc etc

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

I definitely approve. Simply because they look fun to use.

Read full topic

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:377052”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=472967.msg3460469#msg3460469 date=1294438244]

It looks cool, but it seems like it would take away most of the fun of trying to design your own circuits, traps, entrances etc.

It also allows you to do things that you can’t do with normal circuits. Also, I have yet to see someone make a circuit on the server, and the only use I’ve seen of any of the redstone materials, is people using the torches as cool lights.
[/quote]

I’ve made quite a few in single player, probably will eventually on the server as well. :)[/quote]
I have made quite a few on other servers (ones that I have the ability to spawn items), and once i get enough redstone on the mscp server I will probably get some there too. However, there are things you can do with Craftbook that you can’t do with just redstone & gates. And even with craftbook, you still have to do work with redstone circuits to get everything to work right.

Read full topic

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:377052”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=472967.msg3460469#msg3460469 date=1294438244]

It looks cool, but it seems like it would take away most of the fun of trying to design your own circuits, traps, entrances etc.

It also allows you to do things that you can’t do with normal circuits. Also, I have yet to see someone make a circuit on the server, and the only use I’ve seen of any of the redstone materials, is people using the torches as cool lights.
[/quote]

I’ve made quite a few in single player, probably will eventually on the server as well. :)[/quote]

I have made an underground lever circuit for my iron door on a previous map we had. Though, it got griefed.

Read full topic

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

If only redstone had the ability to make a block fall or destroy a block. Then the possibilities would be endless…

It looks cool, but it seems like it would take away most of the fun of trying to design your own circuits, traps, entrances etc.
[/quote]
It also allows you to do things that you can’t do with normal circuits. Also, I have yet to see someone make a circuit on the server, and the only use I’ve seen of any of the redstone materials, is people using the torches as cool lights.[/quote]

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Yea, its a really fun add on. You can do things like gates, hidden buttons, wireless signal transmitters, elevators, all that fun stuff

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:3, topic:377052”]As for the CraftBook, does it work server-sided? It looks cool and definitely should be added, along with anything that adds more creativity… Although it could pose a problem when the client gets updated and one of the mods is not up to date.[/quote]Ofc it works server sided, it’s a server add on.

Read full topic

item.title: You guys should add Craftbook!
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

We should also add runes, just because nobody will be able to get the materials to create what plays the Sun’s Song (If you don’t know what that means you’re not a Zelda fan and will never know!!! HAHAHA!)

As for the CraftBook, does it work server-sided? It looks cool and definitely should be added, along with anything that adds more creativity… Although it could pose a problem when the client gets updated and one of the mods is not up to date.

Read full topic
